data.text: @ursulawren You should also vote out your clerk of Court in November 2022. He is corrupt he supported his assistant Johanna Finkelstein in a federal lawsuit. She was sued for violating the rights of a 91 year old woman. #ashevillenc #nc #NorthCarolina Womack vs. Finkelstein https://t.co/oNy9inMVPs

@ursulawren Throughout much of the pandemic among major urban n.c. counties Asheville/Buncombe's consistently had one of the worst, often the worst, death rates/tallies per population. Delved into this some last April. Clearly still the case: https://t.co/QWk8M1P3h0 #avlnews

Data sourced from here, which does appear to be actively maintained. Using total death counts / estimated population as of 2020 per census bureau. Please let me if I got something wrong! 

https://t.co/rnkBVPsyGN

However, in terms of the whole state, Buncombe's death % is far from the worst at 68/100. You can see the full list here:

https://t.co/1nBFVweGtQ
